message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a truly unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a substantial amount to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1200000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $900000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. I'm willing to go down to $1050000. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm starting to think you're getting a good deal, but I'm not ready to give it away. I'm willing to go down to $1020000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think, Bob?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $980000. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $980000. I'm willing to go down to $1015000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm starting to think I might have to consider other options if we can't meet in the middle.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $970000. Can you meet me at this price?
